title: Boards won't recognize account level
body: I got this account to level 5, but the boards still register it as level 1. I can't do anything but post here. What's up?

replies.body: Since your account is new, it has to sync to the boards.  It looks like you're showing as level 5 now.  Let me know if you still have issues posting!

I had a similar issue. My level was 5 on Boards when I was at level 23.
When I post a discussion on Help Boards, my level on Boards was renewed into 23.

However, I'm still not able to post on Gameplay Boards now.
I tired that again and it worked!
Yes, I eventually became able to post on Gameplay board yesterday.
